rows.label: qst104201_msg0001
rows.name: Well now, what should I do...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0002
rows.name:
You see, there's a bit of a problem
concerning the children...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmm... As you know, the Holy See
of Acedia was destroyed in the
recent conflict, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst104201_msg0004
rows.name:
Because of that, our Martis
can no longer attend the Holy
See's theological school.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0005
rows.name:
We can no longer provide the
children with a good education...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0007
rows.name:
We could repair this building that
no one is currently using...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0008
rows.name:
...gather good teachers
from all over Alst...

rows.label: qst104201_msg0009
rows.name:
...and establish a new school
right here in Iyasaki Village!

rows.label: qst104201_msg0010
rows.name: Oh! That is most welcome news.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0011
rows.name:
First, we need to get the
school building in order.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0012
rows.name:
Since no one has used it,
it's fallen into disrepair
in places you can't see.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0013
rows.name:
There's a carpenter named
Hummer behind the building.

rows.label: qst104201_msg0014
rows.name:
He should be figuring out the
repairs. Could you go and help him?

rows.label: qst104201_msg0015
rows.name:
Just as the name Iyasaki implies,
let's support the children's
new beginnings together!

rows.label: qst104201_msg0101
rows.name:
I want the children to learn
and grow here, and to survive
in this difficult world.
